The current period presentation classifies all changes in funds receivable and customer accounts and funds payable and amounts due to customers consistently on our condensed consolidated statement of cash flows as cash flows from investing activities and cash flows from financing activities, respectively, regardless of which product the cash flows relate to on our Payments Platform. (2) “Pre” represents amounts as previously reported. “Adj.” represents adjustments to conform with current period presentation. “Post” represents amounts reclassified to be consistent with the current period presentation.
